body: I got banned for kill aura. I don't hack though. everyone thinks i do but i don't. Can i get unbanned? Avicus is my favourite server.
body_tagged: I got banned for kill aura. I don't hack though. everyone thinks i do but i don't. Can i get unbanned? Avicus is my favourite server.
title: I got banned

replies.body: Please email support@avicus.net with a proper appeal, thanks.
replies.body_tagged: Please email support@avicus.net with a proper appeal, thanks.

replies.body: Submit your appeal to support@avicus.net, not the forums ^_^
replies.body_tagged: Submit your appeal to support@avicus.net, not the forums ^_^

replies.body:
As previously stated, please email support@avicus.net to appeal.
The forums is not the place for this.
